Package index

Core workflow

Functions for main data retrieval workflow

arad_get_data()
Retrieve data from ARAD API
arad_get_series()
Get a specific data series from ARAD
arad_get_indicators()
Retrieve list of available indicators from ARAD API

Metadata and categories

Functions for exploring data structure

arad_get_metadata()
Retrieve metadata for indicators or series
arad_get_categories()
Retrieve categories from ARAD API

Utility functions

Helper functions for data processing

arad_parse_date()
Convert ARAD period to Date
arad_validate_indicators()
Validate indicator IDs
arad_format_data()
Format ARAD data for analysis
arad_example_indicators()
Get available indicators
